newsitem.title: USA: AGA says U.S. weekly natgas stocks rose 96 bcf.
newsitem.headline: AGA says U.S. weekly natgas stocks rose 96 bcf.

text.p: American Gas Association estimates of U.S. working gas in storage in billion cubic feet (bcf):

Notes: (2) Incl Texas, Okla., Kansas, N.Mexico, Arkansas, Louisiana, and Miss. (3) Incl states east of Miss. River less Miss., plus Iowa, Neb and Missouri (4) Incl states west of the Miss. River less producing region and Iowa, Neb. and Missouri.
Survey sample and full working gas estimates
- Survey Sample Est. Full Work- Yr-Ago
Notes: (5)This Week regional and Total U.S. volumes divided by Estimated Full regional and Total U.S. volumes. This statistic is intended to show how "full" working gas is at any given time.

(6)This percentage value describes the survey sample size each week (sample may change if companies fail to report or a company is added to the weekly survey). It is determined by dividing the maximum volume held in recent years in reported pools for all the reporting companies in a given region for that week by that regions estimated full. Any additions to the sample or failures to report are reflected in a percentage change from the prior week.
